謝.definition: to thank; (bound form) to apologize; (bound form) to decline; to refuse; (bound form) (of flowers, leaves etc) to wither

謝候.definition: to thank sb for favor or hospitality

謝孝.definition: to visit friends to thank them after a funeral

謝客.definition: to decline to meet a visitor; to express one's gratitude to one's guests

謝家集.definition: Xiejiaji, a district of Huainan City 淮南市[Huai2nan2 Shi4], Anhui

謝家集區.definition: Xiejiaji, a district of Huainan City 淮南市[Huai2nan2 Shi4], Anhui

謝師宴.definition: banquet hosted by students in honor of their teachers

謝幕.definition: to take a curtain call; (fig.) to come to an end

謝恩.definition: to thank sb for favor (esp. emperor or superior official)

謝拉.definition: Zerah (son of Judah in the Old Testament)

謝病.definition: to excuse oneself because of illness

謝罪.definition: to apologize for an offense; to offer one's apology for a fault

謝赫.definition: Xie He (479-502), portrait painter from Qi of Southern dynasties 南齊|南齐[Nan2 Qi2]

謝辛.definition: Chea Sim, president of Cambodian National Assembly

謝通門.definition: Xaitongmoin county, Tibetan: Bzhad mthong smon rdzong, in Shigatse prefecture, Tibet

謝通門縣.definition: Xaitongmoin county, Tibetan: Bzhad mthong smon rdzong, in Shigatse prefecture, Tibet

謝長廷.definition: Frank Chang-ting Hsieh (1946-), Taiwanese DPP politician, mayor of Kaohsiung 1998-2005

謝霆鋒.definition: Tse Ting-Fung or Nicholas Tse (1980-), Cantopop star

謝靈運.definition: Xie Lingyun (385-433) poet during Song of the Southern Dynasties 南朝宋
